trans-unit.source: Flashes the specified window one time

seg-source.mrk: Flashes the specified window one time

target.mrk: Flashes the specified window one time

trans-unit.source: Handle to the window to be flashed. The window can be either open or minimized.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the window to be flashed.
The window can be either open or minimized.

target.mrk: Handle to the window to be flashed.
The window can be either open or minimized.

trans-unit.source: [optional] If True, the window is flashed from one state to the other.

seg-source.mrk: If True, the window is flashed from one state to the other.

target.mrk: If True, the window is flashed from one state to the other.

trans-unit.source: If False the window is returned to its original state.

seg-source.mrk: If False the window is returned to its original state.

target.mrk: If False the window is returned to its original state.

trans-unit.source: When an application is minimized and this parameter is True, the taskbar window button flashes active/inactive.

seg-source.mrk: When an application is minimized and this parameter is True, the taskbar window button flashes active/inactive.

target.mrk: When an application is minimized and this parameter is True, the taskbar window button flashes active/inactive.

trans-unit.source: If it is False, the taskbar window button flashes inactive, meaning that it does not change colors.

seg-source.mrk: If it is False, the taskbar window button flashes inactive, meaning that it does not change colors.

target.mrk: If it is False, the taskbar window button flashes inactive, meaning that it does not change colors.

trans-unit.source: It flashes as if it were being redrawn, but it does not provide the visual invert clue to the user.

seg-source.mrk: It flashes as if it were being redrawn, but it does not provide the visual invert clue to the user.

target.mrk: It flashes as if it were being redrawn, but it does not provide the visual invert clue to the user.

trans-unit.source: This function does not change the active state of the window.

seg-source.mrk: This function does not change the active state of the window.

target.mrk: This function does not change the active state of the window.

trans-unit.source: To flash the window a specified number of times, use the FlashWindowEx function.

seg-source.mrk: To flash the window a specified number of times, use the FlashWindowEx function.

target.mrk: To flash the window a specified number of times, use the FlashWindowEx function.
